import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' export default class Signup extends Component { state = { nome: "", email: "", senha: "" } onChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const { nome, email, senha } = this.state axios.post('/api/register', { nome, email, senha }).then(res => console.log(res)) } render() { return (
this.onSubmit(e)}>
